title: Ep 37: Natch Beaut Crossover! with Jackie Johnson
itunes:title: Ep 37: Natch Beaut Crossover! with Jackie Johnson
itunes:subtitle: It's a podcast crossover episode with Jackie Johnson, the host of Natch Beaut! Jackie talks to Kate and Doree about the difference between vegan and cruelty-free products (and why both are important to her), her current skincare regimen, the impor...
description:
It's a podcast crossover episode with Jackie Johnson, the host of Natch Beaut! Jackie talks to Kate and Doree about the difference between vegan and cruelty-free products (and why both are important to her), her current skincare regimen, the importance of cutting toxic people out of your life, and the healing powers of her dog, Chooch. Plus, Kate and Doree get into their latest (cozy) reads and discuss the challenges of pregnancy-related nausea and vomiting during the first trimester.

Follow Jackie @JackieMicheleJohnson on Instagram and @Jackie_Michele on Twitter, and be sure to listen to Kate and Doree on this week’s episode of Natch Beaut!

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram (also: @katespencer, @doree), and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (password: serums).

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Phlur - Try three fragrances for 20% off when you go to Phlur.com and enter the code Forever35.
  • Third Love – Get 15% off your first order when you visit ThirdLove.com/Forever.
  • Casper Mattress – Get $50 toward select mattresses by visiting Casper.com/forever35 and using FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Thrive Market – Visit ThriveMarket.com/Forever35 for $20 off your first 3 orders of $49 or more + free shipping.
  • Lola - For 40% off your first order, visit mylola.com and enter Forever35 when you subscribe.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
